<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the marker algorithm from &quot;Simple and Efficient Construction of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Static Single Assignment Form&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The simple, non-marker algorithm places phi nodes at any join</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here, we place markers, and only place phi nodes if they end up necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// They are only necessary if they break a cycle (IE we recursively visit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ourselves again), or we discover, while getting the value of the operands,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that there are two or more definitions needing to be merged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This still will leave non-minimal form in the case of irreducible control</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flow, where phi nodes may be in cycles with themselves, but unnecessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of that thing with us, since we are in the way of whatever was there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We now define that def&#39;s memorydefs and memoryphis</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DefBeforeSameBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Leave the MemoryUses alone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Also make sure we skip ourselves to avoid self references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DefBeforeSameBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there was a local def before us, we must have the same effect it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// did. Because every may-def is the same, any phis/etc we would create, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would also have created.  If there was no local def before us, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performed a global update, and have to search all successors and make</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sure we update the first def in each of them (following all paths until</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we hit the first def along each path). This may also insert phi nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: There are other cases we can skip this work, such as when we have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// single successor, and only used a straight line of single pred blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// backwards to find the def.  To make that work, we&#39;d have to track whether</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// getDefRecursive only ever used the single predecessor case.  These types</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of paths also only exist in between CFG simplifications.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is the first def in the block and this insert is in an arbitrary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// place, compute IDF and place phis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get recursive last Def, assuming well formed MSSA and updated DT.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GetLastDef = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryaccess">MemoryAccess</a> &#42; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check number of predecessors, we only care if there&#39;s more than one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">        Pred = Pi;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If BB has multiple predecessors, get last definition from IDom.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> != 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;SimpleLoopUnswitch&#93; If BB is a dead block, about to be deleted, its</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DT is invalidated. Return LoE as its last def. This will be added to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MemoryPhi node, and later deleted when the block is deleted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;IDom = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(BB)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#a453de62c2dadf7b4b8df04e89f6ab4e0">getIDom</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Single predecessor, BB cannot be dead. GetLastDef of Pred.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 1 &amp;&amp; Pred &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Single predecessor expected.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BB can be unreachable though, return LoE if that is the case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">        BB = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unable to get last definition.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get nearest IDom given a set of blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: this can be optimized by starting the search at the node with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lowest level (highest in the tree).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FindNearestCommonDominator =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-structurizecfg-cpp-/#a68d8ef4336337d48e93d2695078eaa8a">BBSet</a>) -&gt; BasicBlock &#42; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrevIDom = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-structurizecfg-cpp-/#a68d8ef4336337d48e93d2695078eaa8a">BBSet</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BB : BBSet)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">      PrevIDom = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a2ec50ab2c78eff965caf3da71cd08be4">findNearestCommonDominator</a>(PrevIDom, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get all blocks that dominate PrevIDom, stop when reaching CurrIDom. Do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// include CurrIDom.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GetNoLongerDomBlocks =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrevIDom, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrIDom,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">          SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;BlocksPrevDom) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">        BlocksPrevDom.push&#95;back(PrevIDom);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextIDom = PrevIDom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BasicBlock &#42;UpIDom =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">                   DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(NextIDom)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#a453de62c2dadf7b4b8df04e89f6ab4e0">getIDom</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#aab2bf365c9f4b976adc7479576dfd5bb">getBlock</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Map a BB to its predecessors: added + previously existing. To get a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deterministic order, store predecessors as SetVectors. The order in each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be defined by the order in Updates (fixed) and the order given by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// children&lt;&gt; (also fixed). Since we further iterate over these ordered sets,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we lose the information of multiple edges possibly existing between two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks, so we&#39;ll keep and EdgeCount map for that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An alternate implementation could keep unordered set for the predecessors,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// traverse either Updates or children&lt;&gt; each time to get  the deterministic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order, and drop the usage of EdgeCount. This alternate approach would still</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// require querying the maps for each predecessor, and children&lt;&gt; call has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// additional computation inside for creating the snapshot-graph predecessors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As such, we favor using a little additional storage and less compute time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This decision can be revisited if we find the alternative more favorable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">PredInfo &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reset optimized on users of this store, and reset the uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A few notes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 This is a slightly modified version of RAUW to avoid walking the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// uses twice here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flags on users of phi nodes if doing the below makes a phi node have all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
